text: la taharuk -ayha alnby- bialquran lisanak hin nuzul alwhy; li'ajal 'ana ttejl bhfzh, mkhaft 'ana ytfllat mnk. 'iina ealayna jameh fi sdrk, thuma an tqrah bilisanik mataa shyt. fa'iidha qrah ealayk rasulina jbryl fastmie lqra'th wanst lh, thuma aqrah kama aqrak 'iyah, thuma 'iina ealayna tawdih ma ashkl ealayk fhmh min meanyh wahkamh
